com.stockticker.logic

Interface StockTickerService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StockTicker

    public interface StockTickerService
    This interface defines the functionality to get tracked stocks. It can also get the current tracked stocks of a user, track and un track stocks, and see if a specific stock is tracked by a specific user.
    Author:
    Michael Grissom

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<StockHistory> getStockHistory(String symbol, Date startDate, Date endDate)
      This method returns a list of stock history based on the stock symbol, start date and end date provided.
      List<StockQuote> getStockQuotes(List<String> symbols)
      This method returns a list of stock quotes based on the stock symbols provided.
      List<String> getTrackedStocks(String username)
      This method gets the tracked stocks for a specific user.
      boolean isStockTracked(String username, String symbol)
      This method checks to see if a stock is tracked for a specific user.
      boolean trackStock(String username, String symbol, boolean tracked)
      This method tracks and un-tracks stocks for a specific user.

    • Method Detail

      • getStockQuotes

        List<StockQuote> getStockQuotes(List<String> symbols)
                                throws BusinessLogicException
        This method returns a list of stock quotes based on the stock symbols provided.
        Parameters:
        symbols - a list of stock symbols
        Returns:
        a list of StockQuote objects
        Throws:
        BusinessLogicException

      • getStockHistory

        List<StockHistory> getStockHistory(String symbol,
                                 Date startDate,
                                 Date endDate)
                                   throws BusinessLogicException
        This method returns a list of stock history based on the stock symbol, start date and end date provided. This method provides one method call instead of two in order to get the stock history
        Parameters:
        symbol - stock symbol to get history for
        startDate - stock history start date
        endDate - stock history end date
        Returns:
        a list of StockHistory objects
        Throws:
        BusinessLogicException

      • getTrackedStocks

        List<String> getTrackedStocks(String username)
                              throws BusinessLogicException
        This method gets the tracked stocks for a specific user.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the user
        Returns:
        a list of tracked stocks
        Throws:
        BusinessLogicException

      • trackStock

        boolean trackStock(String username,
                 String symbol,
                 boolean tracked)
                   throws BusinessLogicException
        This method tracks and un-tracks stocks for a specific user.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the user
        symbol - the stock symbol
        tracked - true to track stock and false to not track the stock
        Returns:
        true if the operation was successful
        Throws:
        BusinessLogicException

      • isStockTracked

        boolean isStockTracked(String username,
                     String symbol)
                       throws BusinessLogicException
        This method checks to see if a stock is tracked for a specific user.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the user
        symbol - the stock symbol
        Returns:
        true if the stock is tracked
        Throws:
        BusinessLogicException
